gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT] Forecasts are inconsistent today. Meteoblue suggests a slight chance of rain (0-0.1") that wasn't stated in the baseline. Too bad we don't have more sources to confirm, it's like trying to catch a bumblebee in the Brussels mist!
